ygData.subject: RE: feign death
ygData.msgSnippet: it already has been... it has been like that for awhile. ... From: Dave Woomer [mailto:dwoomer@home.com] Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 1:27 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
it already has been... it has been like that for awhile.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Woomer [mailto:dwoomer@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 1:27 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] feign death


From: "Dave Woomer" <dwoomer@...>

I don't know if this has made it to the production servers yet or not, but
on Test Server, when you hit Feign Death, auto attack is automatically
disengaged.


-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, October 14, 1999 3:32 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] feign death


>From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
>If you are in combat you have to stop attacking before you feign.
>(Hit A then feign).
>
>You know it works when you do not see any message. If you see a message
>"Monk has fallen to the ground", it's failed. Get up run for 8 seconds
>or trying fighting, whichever you want to do. then get ready to feign
>again.
>
>Also, if something is casting a spell on you, it will always hit you,
>there is no escape.
>
>>
>> From: CLMarkley@...
>>
>> I just got the skill, and used all my practices to max it. Now i was
>> wondering if anyone has any tips as hhow to make it work more reliably,
and a
>> list of the types of (or individual) mobs that can see through it.
>>
>> >
>
>
